title: Victorybit1
author: Victorybit1
content: Society is  the basis upon which human civilization is created. It is our collective ideas that shape our lives, governs our behaviour and provide us with a sense of belongings. As such, it's important we take steps to better our society, let's create a world that is fairer, more equitable for everyone.One of the key ways in which we can better society is by promoting education. Education is the foundation upon which every great society is built. It empowers individuals, brings up creativity and innovation and cultivates critical thinking skills. For example, it's the innovative and creative idea of Satoshi Nakamoto that we enjoy bitcoin today. Let the government invest in education from the earliest years of life through adulthood by providing opportunities for lifelong learning.Another way in which we can better society is by promoting diversity and inclusion. Society is stronger when it embraces diversity and recognizes the unique contributions of all individuals. We must work to eliminate discrimination and promote equal opportunities for all. This means creating workplaces, schools, and communities that are welcoming to people of all backgrounds and cultures. By embracing diversity and inclusion, we can create a more vibrant and harmonious society.Let love lead at all time! Peace!

They have failed to invest in quality education in my country because their children school abroad. Politicians prefer to loot funds for their future generations instead of investing in the future of the nation. The same politicians promote tribalism and racism because they want to divide the people. A divided people can be easily manipulated and controlled. Until we embrace critical thinking and stop judging people by their physical appearance the world will not be a better place. It is possible to reduce inequality and poverty if the world's top economy nations are committed to them.

comments.author: Stepstowealth
comments.body: Trying to make the society a better place starts with making your own bed every morning when you wake up, that is to say that making the world a better place starts from you. Making your bed means having a sense of responsibility, which is an important character that makes one a good member of society. If you have a sense of responsibility, you will not litter your environment, you will keep public and government property in good condition whenever you use it and you will obey government rules.
